txt.en: Fissure-worm scales look like they would make strong armour for the Elves of Rivendell.
'Excellent, [placeholder], that should be enough scales to satisfy my clients in Rivendell.'
'I am afraid the shipment I promised the Elves was quite large. You will need a fair bushel of scales before I can fulfill it, but they are simple enough to harvest in the caves to the south-east.'
Fissure-worm scales look like they would make strong armour for the Elves of Rivendell.
Bring the Fissure-worm Scales to Thorgest
The worm-caves are to the south-east of Thorgest's dwelling.\n\nFissure-worm scales look like they would make strong armour for the Elves of Rivendell.
